sub_title: Paradise Worldwide // Zanoise Talent // Freelance Music Business Consultant // Bridging the music industry knowledge gap, brick by brick.
summary:
With almost 30 years of experience in the music industry, I am a highly experienced professional specialising in music publishing, copyright, and rights management. I am dedicted to creating a more equitable music landscape, ensuring everyone can access education on rights management to claim rightful royalties. Mentorship is a big part of my professional life.  I take pride in serving as a mentor for HEMI Incubator, nurturing music entrepreneurs and professionals across Central and South-eastern Europe. My commitment, diverse roles, and extensive experience significantly impact emerging and established talents worldwide. Through my endeavours, I champion education, empowerment, and progress in the global music community.

In January 2023, I founded Mandy Salem-Aubry Music Services. I hold multiple key roles as a freelancer, contributing significantly to the music industry's advancement. I am Head of Knowledge and Communication at Paradise Worldwide, a global music company renowned for accelerating the careers of independent artists and labels through their data-driven approach to music distribution, royalty collection and artist development. I am also engaged in business development for two other prominent companies. I collaborate with Zanoise Talent, a specialised neighbouring rights administration company, and lend my expertise to Fync, an innovative startup streamlining the sync licensing process worldwide.
